DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate efficacy Cisplatin , Paclitaxel , Gemcitabine +/- Avastin ( Bevacizumab ) patient unknown primary tumor .
DOC.brief_title: Cisplatin/Paclitaxel/Gemcitabine +/- Avastin Patients With Unknown Primary Tumor
DOC.detailed_description: Upon determination eligibility , patient randomly assign one two treatment arm : Arm A : Cisplatin , Paclitaxel Gemcitabine - Cisplatin 75 mg/m2 IV infusion , Day 1 - Paclitaxel 175 mg/m2 IV infusion , Day 1 - Gemcitabine 1000 mg/m2 IV infusion , Day 1 8 Arm B : Cisplatin , Paclitaxel , Gemcitabine Avastin ( Bevacizumab ) - Cisplatin 75 mg/m2 IV infusion , Day 1 - Paclitaxel 175 mg/m2 IV infusion , Day 1 - Gemcitabine 1000 mg/m2 IV infusion , Day 1 8 - Bevacizumab 7,5 mg/m2 IV infusion , Day 1 Patients stratify number metastatic site ( one versus two ) level Lactate Dehydrogenase ( normal versus high ) . The regimen repeat every 21 day .
